website_summaries.verdict: PUBG has a lot of momentum, due to its growing user base, departure from the FPS/survival genre norms, and technically impressive play environment. But there's still room for improvement.

customer_reviews.title: Great game, still in Beta (Alpha?) but still worth the money for fans of the genre.
customer_reviews.text: Not a real game, but really fun especially for a greenlight. I like some of the direction Blue Hole is taking but I think it doesn't really have the potential to keep getting better and better over long periods of time. Gameplay is still buggy and feels a little clunky, and the devs took back a promise to not have microtransactions in the game until full release. I don't think it's a huge deal, but the change of attitude is a little worrying. TL;DR I'd buy it for hardcore FPS fans, but not worth it for people who aren't into the competitive format.
customer_reviews.author: Vick

customer_reviews.title: 2017 Game Of The Year (IMO)
customer_reviews.text: FX-8350, R9-290X, 2x4gb2400mhzCAS8DDR3, 120gbSSD, 1080p60hz single monitor... game has run well, and been very playable since first installation. Regular updates, and a developer team that gets involved with the community is excellent, they value our suggestions and feedback. 100 player matches are always full, can find a game and be on the server within minutes 24/7. Worldwide servers. Not too bloody, or extra trashy adult themed content... just good solid battle-royal 1pp or 3pp shooter gameplay.

customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: My Code worked fine --- Review included
customer_reviews.text: Will review the actual game later, but just wanted to say that my code worked fine. **Edit** This game is decent as far as battle-royale FPS games go. To be brief and to the point, I'm a bit disappointed at the lack of improvement after all this time, PR, and money. The hit registry is still strange, the graphics are poorly optimized, and, compared to other games in the same genre, it just feels like a ton of searching with very little fighting in-between.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Dorn

customer_reviews.title: Sweet ass Game
customer_reviews.text: While this game has its flaws like many others it is truly my favorite! The heart pounding jump out of your chest excitement when you get your first kill, and your first chicken dinner! Having said that this game will piss you off an unfortunate amount of times. The largest streamers in the world have been playing for the last few months and they make it look fun! Having said that buy it for PC, DO NOT wait for the console version it does not compare to the keyboard pounding action that comes along with it! Play the game as if when you die in the game you die in real life. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Gandy

customer_reviews.title: The hype is real
customer_reviews.text: This game is great. As someone who couldn't get into ARMA or Day-Z, I am surprised how much I love this game. There's a strange sense of tension when playing solo that you just don't get from other games. Playing doubles is also a silly amount of fun.

product_meta.title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS [Online Game Code]
product_meta.description:
PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS is a last-man-standing shooter being developed with community feedback. Starting with nothing, players must fight to locate weapons and supplies in a battle to be the lone survivor. This realistic, high tension game is set on a massive 8x8 km island with a level of detail that showcases Unreal Engine 4's capabilities.

PLAYERUNKNOWN aka Brendan Greene, is a pioneer of the Battle Royale genre. As the creator of the Battle Royale game-mode found in the ARMA series and H1Z1 : King of the Kill, Greene is co-developing the game with veteran team at Bluehole to create the most diverse and robust Battle Royale experience to date Not Just a Game. This is BATTLE ROYALE


PC Minimum System Requirements:PC Recommended System Requirements: * Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
 * RAM: 6 GB
 * Hard Disk: 30 GB
 * Video Card: nVidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2 GB
 * Supported OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 7




AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Realistic gunplay mechanics with a large array of weapons & attachements
Session based gameplay with an in-depth loot system and different end-game locations each round
State of the art character customization system
